description: This source file provides functions for creating and manipulating JSON objects related to 'sheens' state representation, including creation of branches, state nodes, reset nodes, time objects, and pattern constraints. It also offers utility functions like boolean to string conversion.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_branch(cJSON * pattern,const char * target,bool is_reference)
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing a branch with a specified pattern, target, and reference flag.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_state_node(cJSON * source,cJSON * branch_array,bool is_message)
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing a state node with optional source, branch array, and message flag.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_reset_node(const char * branch_node)
methods.description: Creates a reset node JSON that always targets a specified branch node, including persistence handling.

methods.name: cJSON * sheens_create_time_object(const icrule_time_t * time)
methods.description: Creates a JSON object representing scheduled time with day of week and specific or relative time.

methods.name: void sheens_pattern_add_constraints_required(cJSON * pattern)
methods.description: Ensures the pattern JSON has required constraints by adding missing keys.

methods.name: const char * bool2str(bool value)
methods.description: Converts a boolean value to its string representation ('true' or 'false').

ctags.name: sheens_create_branch
ctags.pattern: /^cJSON* sheens_create_branch(cJSON* pattern, const char* target, bool is_reference)$/

ctags.name: sheens_create_state_node
ctags.pattern: /^cJSON* sheens_create_state_node(cJSON* source, cJSON* branch_array, bool is_message)$/
